worsted acrylic yarn and with a 3mm hook it measures to be 40cm blocked and stretched onto hoop another one i have made not pictured was made using fingering/ 4 ply cotton yarn with a 2 5mm hook and it measures 30cm blocking is suggested but not completely necessary i have used 6 colours in total but you can pick and choose as much as you like skill level intermediate - this patterns requires knowledge of slightly more difficult stitches including front post and back post stitches puff stitch and clusters size 15 rounds in total the finished size of your mandala will vary depending on hook and yarn as well as your gauge almost any size yarn and hook will work so feel free to get creative materials required hook yarn scissors embroidery needle hoop if mounting stitch abbreviations us
